Name: Notification of intent to alter or demolish certain rent regulated housing accommodations.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notification of intent to alter or demolish certain rent regulated housing accommodations

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings

Attachments.Name: Minutes of the Stated Meeting - February 28, 2024

Summary: This bill would change the period in which inspection fees may be charged by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development under Local Law 65 of 2014.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Article 104 of title 28 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 28-104.8.1.1 to read as follows:
�28-104.8.1.1 Notification to appropriate community board and council member. Within ten business days after receiving an application containing a statement described by item 3 of section 28-104.8.2, the department shall notify in writing the community board of the community district in which the site of the building to be altered or demolished is located and the council member in whose district such site is located.

      � 2. This local law takes effect 120 days after it becomes law.
